a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Biofuel production is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh) per year, and includes both bioethanol and biodiesel.
Data source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023)
Note: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States) is an organization of ten post-Soviet republics in Eurasia following break-up of the Soviet
